info_errors.title: Tea Break? (404)
info_errors.text: The tea is brewing, but this page isn't ready yet. How about browsing our other flavors... I mean, pages?

info_errors.title: No Peeking! (403)
info_errors.text: Whoops! Looks like this particular tea blend is for our eyes only. You don't have permission to view it. Perhaps another flavor?

info_errors.title: Wrong Ingredients! (400)
info_errors.text: Hmm, that request didn't quite blend well. It seems there's a little mix-up on our end (or yours!). Try again with a fresh request?

info_errors.title: Tea's Still Brewing... (1)
info_errors.text: Hold on a moment! The tea leaves are just starting to unfurl. Something's taking a little longer than expected. Maybe try again in a sip?

info_errors.title: No Strainer! (2)
info_errors.text: Oops! Can't serve without it! We're on it.

info_errors.title: Invalid Data! (3)
info_errors.text: Oops! That data doesn't quite blend. Please check and try again!
